properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; South Haven to Holland MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 13 at 3:35PM EST until January 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds of 15 to 25 knots by mid morning Tuesday.
Those winds will become west Tuesday night. Waves will build to
4 to 6 feet by Tuesday afternoon, then continue into Tuesday
night.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Holland.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 4 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY
